pr_title: Moved 'parseState()' method into 'GroupFunctionHelper' and apply only if needed

timeline.message:
Nullness annotations for 'TypeParser'
Moved 'parseState()' method into 'GroupFunctionHelper' and apply only if
needed

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>

Reverted: Nullness annotations for 'TypeParser'

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>

timeline.bodyText:
FTR: This class makes use of static logger calls in non-static methods which in general can be replaced. E.g.
https://github.com/cweitkamp/openhab-core/blob/d1ab014173aa254284989a83ae329c70c09fea1b/bundles/org.openhab.core/src/main/java/org/openhab/core/internal/items/GroupFunctionHelper.java#L116-L117
timeline.author: cweitkamp

timeline.message:
Changed logger in class

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>
